channel.title: 100 errors!

item.title: 100 errors!

item.title: 100 errors!
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

“class, interface, or enum expected” refers to you adding an unneeded bracket or semicolon. look through the code and see if there are any unnecessary brackets (there should be one “{” for every “}”) or an unnecessary semicolon.

Read full topic
